mapper.select: select * from company_info where id = #{id} and del_flag = 0

SELECT ci.id FROM company_info ci INNER JOIN company_tag cg ON ci.id=cg.company_info_id
AND cg.`tag_id` =#{request.tagId}
AND ci.`uscc` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.uscc},'%')
AND ci.`corp_nm` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.corpNm},'%')
AND ci.del_flag = 0 AND cg.del_flag = 0

SELECT ci.* FROM company_info ci 1=1 AND ci.del_flag=0
AND ci.id IN ( SELECT icr.company_info_id FROM industrial_company_relation icr INNER JOIN company_info ci ON icr.company_info_id=ci.id INNER JOIN industrial i ON i.id=icr.industrial_id WHERE i.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.industrialName},'%') AND i.del_flag = 0 AND icr.del_flag = 0 )
AND ci.id IN ( SELECT ct.company_info_id FROM company_tag ct INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ct.company_info_id=ci.id WHERE ct.tag_id = #{request.tagId} AND ct.del_flag = 0 )
AND ci.id IN ( SELECT icr.company_info_id FROM industrial_company_relation icr WHERE icr.industrial_id = #{request.industrialId} AND icr.del_flag = 0 )
AND ci.uscc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.industrialName},'%')
AND ci.corp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.corpNm},'%')
order by ci.update_time desc , ci.tag_num desc limit #{request.pageStart},#{request.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM company_info ci 1=1 AND ci.del_flag=0
AND ci.id IN ( SELECT icr.company_info_id FROM industrial_company_relation icr INNER JOIN company_info ci ON icr.company_info_id=ci.id INNER JOIN industrial i ON i.id=icr.industrial_id WHERE i.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.industrialName},'%') AND i.del_flag = 0 AND icr.del_flag = 0 )
AND ci.id IN ( SELECT ct.company_info_id FROM company_tag ct INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ct.company_info_id=ci.id WHERE ct.tag_id = #{request.tagId} AND ct.del_flag = 0 )
AND ci.id IN ( SELECT icr.company_info_id FROM industrial_company_relation icr WHERE icr.industrial_id = #{request.industrialId} AND icr.del_flag = 0 )
AND ci.uscc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.industrialName},'%')
AND ci.corp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.corpNm},'%')
